Generation I.Red: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
Generation I.Yellow: The belt around its waist holds back its energy. Without it, this Pok é mon would be unstoppable.
Generation I.Stadium: Although it is incredibly strong, it is always modest. It restrains its strength with a power-save belt.

Generation II.Gold: It always goes at its full power, but this very tough and durable Pok é mon never gets tired.
Generation II.Silver: The muscles covering its body teem with power. Even when still, it exudes an amazing sense of strength.
Generation II.Crystal: This tough Pok é mon always stays in the zone. Its muscles become thicker after every battle.
Generation II.Stadium 2: It always goes at its full power, but this very tough and durable Pok é mon never gets tired. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) The muscles covering its body teem with power. Even when still, it exudes an amazing sense of strength. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Machoke 's thoroughly toned muscles possess the hardness of steel. This Pok é mon has so much strength, it can easily hold aloft a sumo wrestler on just one finger.
Generation III.Sapphire: Machoke undertakes bodybuilding every day even as it helps people with tough, physically demanding labor. On its days off, this Pok é mon heads to the fields and mountains to exercise and train.
Generation III.Emerald: A belt is worn by a Machoke to keep its overwhelming power under control. Because it is so dangerous, no one has ever removed the belt.
Generation III.FireRed: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

Generation IV.Diamond: Machoke 's boundless power is very dangerous, so it wears a belt that suppresses its energy.
Generation IV.Pearl: It can lift a dump truck with one hand. Using that power, it helps people with heavy jobs.
Generation IV.Platinum: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It always goes at its full power, but this very tough and durable Pokémon never gets tired.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: The muscles covering its body teem with power. Even when still, it exudes an amazing sense of strength.

Generation V.Black: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.
Generation V.White: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.
Generation V.Black 2: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.
Generation V.White 2: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.

Generation VI.X: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
Generation VI.Y: It can lift a dump truck with one hand. Using that power, it helps people with heavy jobs.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Machoke's thoroughly toned muscles possess the hardness of steel. This Pokémon has so much strength, it can easily hold aloft a sumo wrestler on just one finger.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Machoke undertakes bodybuilding every day even as it helps people with tough, physically demanding labor. On its days off, this Pokémon heads to the fields and mountains to exercise and train.

Generation VII.Sun: As a result of its continual workouts, it has developed tremendous power. It uses that power to help people with their work.
Generation VII.Moon: It willingly assists with hard labor because it knows the work is good training for its muscles.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: When it encounters an enemy that's truly mighty, this Pokémon removes the power-save belt from its waist and unleashes its full power.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: A popular motif for sculptures, its incredibly well-developed muscles have captured the imagination of many an artist.
Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: The belt around its waist holds back its energy. Without it, this Pokémon would be unstoppable.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: The belt around its waist holds back its energy. Without it, this Pokémon would be unstoppable.

Generation VIII.Sword: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
Generation VIII.Shield: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Machoke's boundless power is very dangerous, so it wears a belt that suppresses its energy.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It can lift a dump truck with one hand. Using that kind of strength, it helps people do heavy jobs.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: A sturdy creature boasting a robust physique and boundless stamina. Loves training above all else and voluntarily assists with tasks such as construction and clearing land.
